dict.string: Increases the damage of Octo-Grab by ###%
Hook can pull up to 2 targets
Increases health and mana granted by Voodoo Ritual by 100%
Divine Storm's radius is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds
Divine Shield lasts 1 second longer and heals for 40% of the target's maximum health
Increases damage and healing by 10% for each target hit, up to 50%
Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage
Damage and healing have 100% effectiveness while in Spirit Form
Hammer of Justice knocks the target back
Each unit healed by Holy Radiance returns 10 mana and reduces the cooldown by 1 second, up to a maximum of 50 mana and 5 seconds
Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1 second
Using Holy Light on minions and mercenaries refunds 75% of its mana cost and cooldown
Basic attacks heal nearby allies for 25% of the damage dealt
Hammer of Justice damage increased by 40%
Starfall can now be cast globally. Damage is increased by 30%
When using Shadowstalk, you and allied heroes gain 25% additional movement speed for 8 seconds, and your next basic attack deals 100% more damage
Gain 40% additional attack speed for 4 seconds when using Hunter's Mark
Basic attacks against marked targets heal for 2% maximum health
Increases width of Sentinel by 100%. Increases damage dealt based on distance traveled, up to a maximum of +200% damage
Lunar Flare deals 50% more damage and refunds all mana if you hit an enemy hero
Hunter's Mark can be cast on structures. All hero basic attacks on Marked targets drain 1 ammo
Increases the range of Lunar Flare by 50% and impact area by 33%
You passively grant 10% basic attack damage and attack speed to nearby allies
If cast on an ally, Light of Elune also cloaks them for 5 seconds
Activate to increase basic attack damage by 40% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 10 mana
If cast on an ally, Light of Elune also increases their movement speed by 25%
When Sentinel impacts, your ability cooldowns are reduced by 4 seconds over 2 seconds
When you are above 90% health, the allied heal is increased by 40%
Lower the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 8 seconds
Sentinel no longer stops at the first hero hit, affecting all enemy heroes along the path
Reduce the cost of Light of Elune by 15 mana
Force Wall range increased by 50% and duration by 1 second
Archon initial shield amount increased by 50%. Basic attacks deal 50% more damage and gain 3 range
While Dimensional Shifted, gain 50% movement speed and heal for ### health
Psionic Storm targets are slowed by 25% for 1 second
After casting Psionic Storm, you may cast Psionic Storm again for free within 3 seconds. The damage does not stack
The target of your Plasma Shield also gains 25% movement speed for 4 seconds
Oracle duration increased by 3 seconds and grants 15% increased movement speed
Dimensional Shift will automatically activate when you fall below 15% health. This effect has a separate 60 second cooldown
Basic attacks slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds
Dimensional Shift duration increased by 0.75 seconds
Enemies damaged by Psionic Storm are marked with Static Charge. Your basic attacks consume the Static Charge to deal ### damage
If Plasma Shield expires, 50% of the shield remains indefinitely. This effect does not stack
Reduces the cooldown of Oracle by 10 seconds
Plasma Shield is 100% stronger and lasts 100% longer when cast on structures
While Plasma Shield is active, 20% of the target's basic attack damage is returned as health
Psionic Storm returns 5 mana for each target initially hit
Increases the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%
Plasma Shield amount is increased 50% on minions and mercenaries and lasts forever
Ancestral Healing now heals for 100% of the allied hero's health. Allies near the target are healed for 25% of the initial amount
Bloodlust affects all allied heroes, minions, and mercenaries on the entire battleground and can be cast without breaking Ghost Wolf
Increases the cast range of Earthbind Totem by 3 and the initial slow becomes a 1 second root
Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts it on you, including any talent bonuses
While in Ghost Wolf, you lunge a short distance towards your attack target. The damage bonus for basic attacks in Ghost Wolf is increased from 100% to 200%
Earthbind Totem automatically gains Lightning Shield when created
Reduces the cooldown of Lightning Shield to 6 seconds and its mana cost by 50%
Increases Chain Heal's healing on the primary target by 25% and heal an additional target
When entering Ghost Wolf, you are cloaked for 2 seconds
Lightning Shield also shields the ally, absorbing ### damage over 3 seconds
Activate to reveal the target area. Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds
Gain 100% increased health regeneration and 100% increased mana regeneration while in Ghost Wolf form
Lightning Shield's duration does not start until an enemy is nearby
Chain Heals on allies with Lightning Shield active are increased by 25%
Increases the area of Earthbind Totem by 50% and its health by 100%
Lightning Shield also increases the damage of the target's next 3 basic attacks by 25%
Reduces mana cost of Chain Heal from 70 to 45
Twilight Dream silence duration increased to 4 seconds and also slows enemies by 50%
Tranquility healing amount is incresed by 25% and restores 5 mana per second
Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, last 25% longer, and roots enemies for 0.5 seconds longer
Moonfire slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds
Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of your next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 10%. Stacks up to 3 times
Moonfire radius increased by 50% and mana cost reduced to 10
Nearby damaged allied heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 15 second cooldown
Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire and Entangling Roots by 2
Increases the duration of Regrowth by 6 seconds
Innervate also increases attack speed by 10% and can be cast on non-mana using heroes
Innervate's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds and grants mana twice as fast
Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant with ### health that does @@@ damage each attack for 12 seconds
Casting Regrowth on minions or mercenaries instantly returns 100% of the mana cost
Moonfire deals 30% more damage to non-heroic targets
After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Dragon is summoned at the point of impact
Jug of 1,000 Cups throws out twice as many cups over the same duration
Duration of Cloud Serpent increased by 50%
Healing Brew throws a drink to the 2 lowest allies, but increases the mana cost by 15
Removes all disabling effects and increases the movement speed of the target by 20% for 2 seconds
Increases the range of Healing Brew, Cloud Serpent and Blinding Wind by 25%
Activate to reduce an enemy hero's damage by 50% and movement speed by 50% for 4 seconds
Upon taking damage, gain 2 charges of Block (50% reduced basic attack damage) for 10 seconds. This effect has a 10 second cooldown
Blinding Wind now also slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds
Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing ### damage each
Cloud Serpent also heals the target for ### health and 20 mana
Health restored from healing brew increased by 25%
Blinding Wind now causes enemies to miss their next 2 basic attacks
Activate to place a Totem on the ground that heals allies in an area for 2% of their max health every second for 10 seconds
Blinding Wind hits up to 5 enemies
Damage dealt by Blinding Wind increased by 25%
While above 80% life, your basic ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster
Releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage
Polymorph targets are slowed by 50% movement speed
After finishing the teleport, the target of your Phase Shift gains a ### point shield for 3 seconds
Targets are slowed by 30% movement speed for 3 seconds
Removes all stuns, roots, silences and slows from the target and prevents their reapplication for 1 second
Soothing Mist activates each time you use a basic ability
Activate to release a Soothing Mist every second for 4 seconds
Activate to shield an allied hero from ### damage for 5 seconds
Block one instance of spell damage by 50%
Increase number of basic attack blocks to 3
Inner area damage of Arcane Flare increased by 33%
Exiting a Nydus Worm spawns 6 broodlings to attack up the nearest lane. This effect has a 20 second cooldown
Can hold up to 2 charges of Hunter Killer
Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and heroes killed while in the Maw reduce its cooldown by 50 seconds
Movement speed boost on Creep increased to 30%
Can hold up to 2 charges of Hunter Killer
Enemies hit by the Drop Pod take an additional 100% of that damage over 4 seconds
Hunter Killer has its range increased by 35% and damage increased by 20%
Your Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk with a bounce attack and 50% increased duration
Channel to regenerate up to 25% of you health and mana over 3 seconds
Creep Tumors spread creep twice as fast and 25% further
Health regeneration bonus on creep increased to 300%
Kills earned by Roachlings increase their duration by 10 seconds
Baneling damage against non-heroic targets increased by 50%
Increases an allied lane minion's damage by 400%. Holds up to 2 charges
Max Creep Tumor charge count increased to 4. Mana cost reduced to 10
Basic attacks deal 25% damage to three nearby targets
Basic attacks have their range increased by 20% (5.5 to 6.6) and deal an additional ### damage over 3 seconds
Health regeneration bonus on creep increased to 300%
Banelings can travel twice as far before exploding
Gargantuan now lasts until an enemy kills the Gargantuan, and deals 100% more damage against non-heroic targets
Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and movement speed by 30%
Increases the damage dealt to heroes from Voodoo Ritual by 200%
Toads explode into Corpse Spiders upon death
Corpse Spiders leap at their targets and deal 25% more damage
Activate to place yourself in stasis and gain invulnerability for 3 seconds
Toad damage is increased by 10% each time they hop
Upon expiring, up to 5 remaining zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds
Increases the explosion area of Plague of Toads and the duration of your other non-heroic abilities, including Voodoo Ritual, by 25%
Corpse Spiders creates 3 more spiders over 3 seconds
Permanently gain 4 health and 2 mana when a unit dies under Voodoo Ritual
Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage
Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits
While in Siege Mode your basic attack range increases by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 5
Increase the movement speed slow of spider mines to 50%, and the duration to 2.5 seconds
Increase the number of mines by 2
Spider Mines knock targets back a short distance
Create a wall of path blocking debris for 4 seconds
Basic attacks deal 25% more damage if you haven't been attacked within the last 5 seconds
Reduce the cooldown of Thrusters by 10 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar
You can move at 50% movement speed in Siege Mode
Enemies cannot move you while in Siege Mode. Grants 2 stacks of Block, each absorbing 50% of a basic attack
Double the knock back distance of Concussive Blast
Cloak when entering Siege Mode. Your next basic attack will deal 100% more damage
While in Siege Mode, the duration of silences, stuns, slows and roots are reduced by 50%
Increase the damage of Concussive Blast by 25%
Increases the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%
March of the Murlocs travel farther and cling to targets for 2 seconds longer
Area of effect of Pufferfish increased by 50%
Slime duration increased by 2 seconds and deals ### impact damage on reapplication
When you respawn from the Egg, you are cloaked for 10 seconds. Sight range of Egg is increased by 150%
Safety Bubble cooldown reduced by 5 seconds
Pufferfish's damage is increased by 50% against heroes, minions, and mercenaries
Your basic attacks deal 50% bonus damage to Slimed targets
Activate to reveal the target area. Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds
Pufferfishes take an additional attack before being disarmed
When you respawn from the egg, ground and mounted movement speed is increased by 20% after respawn for 5 seconds. Egg health increased by 200%
Gain 20% movement speed while in Safety Bubble
Basic attacks deal an additional 130% damage to heroes and increase the duration of Robo-Goblin by 0.5 seconds per hit
Grav-O-Bomb radius increased by 25% and damage increased by 50%
Your hero is no longer dismounted from taking damage. Increases mount speed to +60% movement speed
Deth Lazor gains an additional charge level after reaching max size, which increases the damage dealt by 50%
Deth Lazor charges twice as fast
Xplodium Charge can now be cast twice in rapid succession
Turret attacks slow movement speed by 25% for 2 seconds
Deth Lazor slows heroes by 35% and freezes minions or structures for 3 seconds

Mercenary Camps your hero captures gain the following bonuses:
Siege Giants: 50% increased damage Knights: 50% increased health
Turrets attack up to 2 additional targets for 50% damage
Basic attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1 second
Enemy minions that die near you have a 15% chance to drop scrap
Deal 25% increased damage to minions, mercenaries and summons
Xplodium Charge damage increased by 10% per target hit, to a maximum of 100% increased damage
Increases the cooldown reduction granted by scrap to 9 over 3 seconds
Increases the amount of mana restored by scrap to 60
Lower the cooldown of Ultimate Evolution to 90 seconds, and increase the duration to 60 seconds
Gain the ability to spawn a nest near Abathur that hatches 3 Locusts
Symbiote's Carapace increases the movement speed of the target by 40% for 3 seconds
Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds
Locust basic attacks become a long-range siege attack
Locust basic attacks cleave, and explode on death for ### damage
Activate to calldown a MULE that repairs structures, one at a time, near target point for 60 seconds, healing for 100 health every 1 second. Grants 1 ammo every 5 seconds
Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for ### health per second
Toxic Nests slow enemies by 50% movement speed for 2 seconds
Increases the range of your Symbiote's Stab by 33%
Activate to give target allied lane minion +200% permanent health and +100% permanent damage. Has 2 charges
Toxic Nests can be placed from unlimited range
Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 100%
Increases the damage of your Symbiote's Stab by 20%
Toxic Nests deal 30% more damage over 3 seconds
Your Symbiote's Spike Burst deals 50% more damage to non-heroic targets
Increases the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%
Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds
Shield is 25% stronger for each allied hero that gets shielded
Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'Druins Might
After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, your next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal 100% more damage
Gain 25% increased damage on your next basic attack for each target hit by Smite
Smite pushes enemies outside the target area
Enemies that attack you while shielded have their attack speed slowed by 50% and movement speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds
When the shield expires, it explodes for ### damage to nearby enemies
After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, gain 25% movement speed for 3 seconds
Non-heroic abilities can be used before exploding, but deal no damage
Cooldown is lowered by 0.5 seconds for each target hit by Smite
Enemies that attack you while shielded grant ### health over 3 seconds
When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health for 5 seconds
Smite deals 50% more damage to heroes
Increases the damage dealt by El'Druin's Might by 25%
While active, Gorge can be repeatedly recast until the first target is expelled. Duration increased by 1 second
Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer and heals for 50% of the damage dealt
Slam damage increased by 50%, and stuns targets for 0.5 seconds
Hook can now pull allied heroes (but will not damage them)
Using Devour also creates a Retchling
Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%
Increases Vile Gas radius by 20% and the duration of the effect by 2 seconds
Using Devour on an enemy hero grats a permanent +2 health per second
If Devour kills an enemy, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds
Basic attacks slow enemies' movement speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds
Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas
Basic attacks create a cloud of Vile Gas on the target
Using Devour also heals you for 10% of you maximum health over 3 seconds
Damage of Haymaker is increased by 25%, and it can store 2 charges
Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of disables are reduced by 75% while in Avatar
Activate to heal for 40% of you maximum health over 8 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time
Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are stunned for 0.75 seconds
Increases the range and impact radius of Dwarf Toss by 75%
Thunderclap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit
Heal 1.5% of your maximum health for each target hit by Thunderclap
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 2 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss
Stormbolt penetrates through, hitting 1 additional target
Every 3rd basic attack against the same target will stun them for 0.25 seconds
Increases Second Wind's health regeneration rates and raises health threshold to 40% health for improved regeneration
Thunderclap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds, dealing ### damage and applying a 25% slow for 2 seconds
Each enemy hit by Thunderclap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds
Stormbolt deals 400% damage to minions and structures and destroys 4 ammo from structures
Enemies hit by Thunderclap have their attack speed reduced by 33% for 3.5 seconds
Stormbolt refunds 45 mana for each enemy hit
Stormbolt's damage is permanently increased by 5 for each enemy hero hit
Reduces the cast and air time of Stage Dive by 50%, and increases the damage dealt by 50%
Makes dancing enemies vulnerable, increasing damage taken by 25%
Guitar Solo's duration is increased by 100%
Increases the stun duration of Powerslide by 50%
Enemies hit by Face Melt are also slowed by 80% for 2 seconds
Increases the duration of Rockstar by 2 seconds, and minions get the full bonus
The Rockstar aura also adds 20% movement speed
After using Guitar Solo, your next basic attack strikes immediately, deals double damage, and heals you for 50% of the damage dealt
Increases the range and knockback of Face Melt by 50%
Guitar Solo now also heals nearby allies for ### health every second for its duration
Guitar Solo's mana cost reduced by 50%
After using an ability, pulse twice for ### damage to nearby enemies
Enemy minions hit by Face Melt also dance for 5 seconds
Increases the damage of Powerslide by 30%
Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer
Apocalypse casts again when you die
Activate to give all nearby allied heroes a shield for 20% of their maximum health for 3 seconds
Can hold up to 2 charges of Overpower
Fire Stomp waves return to Diablo, dealing 150% damage
Casting Fire Stomp surrounds you in flames that deal ### damage every second for 10 seconds
Shadow Charge also slows the target by 25% for 3 seconds
Shadow Charge's range is increased by 33%
Activate to consume 1 Soul per second to regenerate 3% of your total health per second
You can hold up to 200 Souls
Fire Stomp deals 50% more damage to non-heroic enemies
Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%
For each Soul, gain an additional 5 health and 0.1 health regeneration per second
Wrath of the Berzerker duration increased by 1 second for every 2 Fury gained. Increases the reduction of disables to 75%
Leaves behind an impassable crater for 4 seconds.
Increase the movement speed bonus from using abilities to 20%
Ancient Spear pulls even if it misses a unit, but gain no Fury
Enemies that attack you have their attack speed slowed by 30%
Whirlwind creates tornadoes that do an additional 25% damage
Using Whirlwind removes all movement impairing effects and increases the amount healed to 25%
Using Seismic Slam temporarily reduces its Fury cost to 50%
Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30%
Activate to heal 10.15% of your maximum health
Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 100% of the primary target damage
Ancient Spear deals an additional 50% damage over 4 seconds.
Seismic Slam damage increased by 50% and Fury cost reduced to 20
Hitting an enemy reduces Ancient Spear's cooldown by 5 seconds
Basic attacks heal you for 25% of the damage dealt
Upon dying, revive back at your Altar after 5 seconds. This can occur once every 120 seconds
Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy heroes are rooted for 1.5 seconds, and the slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds
3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls last 50% longer
Frostmourne Hungers now applies to your next 2 basic attacks
Death Coil deals 20% more damage for each 10% of life you are missing
Death Coil also heals when used on enemies. When used on self, the amount healed is increased by 50%
Frozen Tempest damage and cost increased by 50%
Howling Blast impacts enemies while travelling
Frostmourne Hungers also slows the target by 40% for 1.5 seconds
Frostmourne Hungers also hits enemies near the target for 50% damage
Death Coil causes enemy minions to explode, killing the target instantly and dealing its normal damage to other nearby enemies
Every 3rd basic attack heals you for 5.85% of your maximum health
Damage boost of Frostmourne Hungers increased to 150% damage
Mana restored by Frostmourne Hungers increased to 60
Reduce damage taken from non-heroic enemies by 50%
Howling Blast cooldown lowered by 2 seconds
Allies are also no longer affected by Void Prison
Shadow Assault grants 30% life steal, and the duration is increased by 50%
After you cast Singularity Spike, you can cast a second one for free within 3 seconds
Cleave deals 30% increased damage if used while cloaked
Gain 25% attack damage for 5 seconds when breaking cloak. 10% increased movement speed while cloaked
For 3 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from
Deals ### damage per second to nearby enemies
No longer decloak when using Singularity Spike. Range increased by 20%
Cleave deals an additional 50% damage over 5 seconds
Activate to teleport to the last target you attacked within 3 seconds
Singularity Spike now explodes for area damage and slows, regardless if it hits a target or not.
Reduces the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds
Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%
Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%. Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage
Odin lasts 50% longer and gains a new ability: Nuclear Blast
Increases the knockback of Frag Grenade by 100%
While the minigun is wound up, gain 15% movement speed
After using Run and Gun, gain 20% attack speed and 20% movement speed for 3 seconds
Overkill applies a stacking slow, up to 20%
Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your hero by 50%
Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%
After attacking for 3 seconds, gain 50% increased attack speed
Frag Grenade deals an additional ### damage to minions and structures
Increases the range of Run and Gun by 25%
Increases the explosion radius of Frag Grenade by 25%
Overkill's damage to the primary target increased by 20%
Banshees remain cloaked while attacking and fire 1 more missile each volley
Hyperion now hits each target up to 2 times per volley. Every 4 seconds Hyperion will fire its Yamato Cannon at enemy structures
Activate to increase your attack speed by 40% and movement speed by 10% for 4 seconds
The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second and takes 50% more damage
Penetrating Round damage is increased by 10% for each additional target hit, and the width is increased by 50%
Adrenaline Rush can be used on command. Doing so reduces the cooldown by 15 seconds
On using Inspire, nearby enemies have their attack speed and movement speed lowered by 10%
Adrenaline Rush cleanses all movement impairing effects, and makes you unstoppable for 2 seconds
Gain 10% movement speed when using Inspire, plus 5% additional movement speed for each ally hero Inspired
Penetrating Round has increased knock back distance, and deals 100% extra damage to structures
Doubles the cooldown reduction of Lead from the Front
Increases your basic attack range by 20% (5.5 to 6.6 range) and sight range by 10%
Places a Scouting Drone at target location, revealing a large area and any cloaked heroes around it for 60 seconds. This Drone can be seen and killed by enemies
Basic attack against structures destroy 1 ammo and deal an additional 10% damage
Precision Strike now holds two charges with a short cooldown
Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy hero
Snipe penetrates through the first enemy hit and deals 50% damage to subsequent targets
Enemies hit by Pinning Shot become vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage for 2 seconds
You can control the Holo Decoy. The Decoy's sight range increased by 100%
Holo Decoy gains AI, deals damage with attacks, and uses Snipe and Pinning Shot, at reduced damage
While cloaked, move 25% faster and regenerate an additional 1.17% health every 2 seconds
Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact
Holo Decoy explodes on expiration, dealing ### damage to nearby enemies
Range of Holo Decoy increased by 100%
Increase your basic attack range from 6.5 to 7.5
Increases the duration of Pinning Shot's slow to 3 seconds
Increases Snipe's damage by 20% when used while cloaked.
Ultralisk duration and health increased by 100%
Maelstrom size increased by 25%. Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom is increased by 100%
Assimilation Shields earned from basic abilities increased by 100%
Activate to gain 75% movement speed for 3 seconds
Assimilation Shield duration increased to 12 seconds
Increases the range of Ravage by 25%
When your basic abilities damage an enemy, your next basic attack hits for 50% extra damage
Impaling Blades spawns 2 zerglings at the target location
Ravage can be used to jump to allies for half the cooldown
Activate to poison an enemy hero, dealing ### damage over 6 seconds
After casting Primal Grasp, deal ### damage over 5 seconds to nearby enemies
If Ravage kills the target, it also restores 100% of its mana cost
Basic attacks splash for 50% damage around Kerrigan
Every 10 seconds, your next basic attack deals 50% additional damage. Basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second
Increases the range of Primal Grasp by 20%
Ravage heals you for 5% of your maximum life
Periodically reduces the damage received from Hero basic attacks by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges
The Hunt now has global range. Greatly increases the acceleration while Hunting a target

Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Demonic Form to 30% and grants a 50% reduction in the duration of disabling effects. Lose the ability to mount, but gain 40% Movement Speed when out of combat for 6 seconds
Abilities now heal for 15% of damage dealt.
Store up to 2 charges of Sweeping Strike
Take 50% reduced damage from abilities while Evasion is active
Ignore all collision while using Sweeping Strike, allowing you to go over walls and terrain
Can use Dive on allies (but you will not flip). When used this way, the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
Increases the range of Dive by 30%
Activate to double the cooldown reduction from basic attacks for 8 seconds
Gain 2 charges of Block (50% reduced basic attack damage) after evasion wears off. Lasts 5 seconds
Gain 20% movement speed for 2 seconds after using Dive
After using an ability, your next basic attack deals 25% additional damage
Basic attacks now heal for 30% of damage dealt
After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for ### damage per second for 3 seconds
Increases the range of Sweeping Strike by 20%
Your next basic attack on the Dive target deals 100% more damage
Evasion grants a ### point shield for 5 seconds.
Increases the basic attack bonus of Sweeping Strike to 40%
Every 3 regeneration globes gathered grants an extra +4 health per second, permanently
Shock and Awe has double the range and deals 25% more damage
Aerial Blitzkrieg casts 50% faster and grants a shield for 50% of Falstad's maximum health
Activate to increase ability power by 25% and mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds
After using Barrel Roll, gain 75% movement speed that decreases over 3 seconds
Reduce activation time for Tailwind to 3 seconds
Activate to reduce the cooldown of your basic abilities by 10 seconds
The Thunderstorm passive effect hits up to two targets at once
Increases the movement speed slow of Hammerang to 50%
Activate to heal 35% of your maximum health over 6 seconds
Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal ### damage around the hammer
The cooldown for Flight is reduced by 15 seconds
The cooldown for Thunderstorm's passive is reduced by 2 seconds
Hammerang deals 150% damage to the first enemy hit
Passively grants 8% ability power. Each hero takedown grants a bonus 2% ability power, up to 12%. This bonus ability power is lost upon death
Basic attacks deal 50% damage against a nearby target
Kill enemy minions to gain stacks of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe target mercenary, instanly defeating them. Does not work on Golems.
The Barrel Roll shield lasts 3 seconds longer
Increases the range of Barrel Roll by 20%
Every 3 regeneration globes gathered grants an extra +0.25 mana per second, permanently
Gain 1 basic attack damage for every 5 enemies killed with basic attacks
Rain of Vengeance now strikes 4 times
Strafe now fires penetrating bolts in a line
Basic attacks bounce twice to nearby enemies for 50% damage
Activate to teleport to a nearby location
Activate to gain 30% of you maximum health as shields for 5 seconds
Activate to steal 15% of target enemy's maximum health and slow its movement speed by 30% for 3 seconds
Vault gains an additional charge, allowing it to be cast twice in quick succession
Basic attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted or stunned targets
Gain up to 10 stacks of Discipline after Hatred stacks are maxed. Basic attacks heal for 3% of damage dealt per Discipline stack.
When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the movement speed bonus increases to 20% total
Multishot also slows by 40% for 2 seconds
Upon taking ability damage, gain a shield that reduces all ability damage taken by 50% for 2 seconds. Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.
Attacks against enemy heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the hero's maximum health
Activate to increase basic attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 15 mana
Drops 3 caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do ### damage and slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.
The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used
Multishot also fire 3 grenades, which deal ### damage.
Basic attacks reduce ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds
Hungering Arrow range increased by 25% and the number of times it can bounce to 3
Every 3rd basic attack against the same target deals 50% additional damage.
Basic attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt
Reduces the cost of Hungering Arrow by 30 mana
Using an ability grants 2 Hatred stacks
Each Hatred stack increases attack speed by 2%
Increases the range of Multishot by 20%
50% of the damage dealt by Hungering Arrow is returned as health to Valla
